27FD9937.Line7.6DE47: 7th: Lost a month’s wages tonight. Unbelievable.

5619C705.Line14.6DE47: 11th: Daughter showed up. Relentless. Something about a demon. Already reported it, but she won't give it up.

8E091FB5.Line5.6DE47: 10th: A woman came to the mines. Gave me a wealth charm. Crazy, but it worked.

F00E4087.Line16.6DE47: Going to keep watch at the mine. Light knows she’ll break in if I don’t.
